item.epic_fight_battle_styles.origin_exc: This relic was once wielded by one of the 10 legendary heroes. It is said that all Excaliburs are based off this original template.
skill.epic_fight_battle_styles.hero.tool: The one with the sword and shield, increased attack speed with swords and axes. Reduced attack speed with everything else.
skill.epic_fight_battle_styles.imperatri:
The legendary battle style of the Eternal Emberlight Empress. Uses primarily swords.

"Hey, learning House Flaron's sword style is a massive responsibility! Good luck!"
skill.epic_fight_battle_styles.precision: Throw your chakram forward with devastating range in a precise area in front of you.
skill.epic_fight_battle_styles.demon.too: A wielder of the demonic blade Satsujin. Increases attack speed but reduces health and defense.
skill.epic_fight_battle_styles.atlantean: The hero of the deep sea imparts knowledge of the attacks that is exclusive to the obsidian blade Herrscher and the nautilus shield Gesetz
